1 //
2 // Original author Asgeir Bjoerkedal & Kristoffer Larsen. Latest change date 01.05.2016
3 // qnode.cpp is responsible for all cross application communication within ROS.
4 //
5 // Created as part of the software solution for a Master's Thesis in Production Technology at NTNU Trondheim.
6 //

9 #include <ros/network.h>

15 namespace agilus_master_project {
16 
17 QNode::QNode(int argc, char** argv ) :
18  init_argc(argc),
19  init_argv(argv),
20  cloud(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>),
21  imageReading(false){
22  qRegisterMetaType<pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr >("pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr");
23  qRegisterMetaType<cv::Mat>("cv::Mat");
24 }
25 
26 QNode::~QNode(){
27  if(ros::isStarted()) {
28  ros::shutdown();
29  ros::waitForShutdown();
30  }
31  wait();
32 }
33 
34 bool QNode::init(){
35  ros::init(init_argc,init_argv,"agilus_master_project");
36  if ( ! ros::master::check() ) {
37  return false;
38  }
39  ros::start();
40  ros::NodeHandle n;
41  try{
42  ag1 = new moveit::planning_interface::MoveGroup("agilus1");
43  ag2 = new moveit::planning_interface::MoveGroup("agilus2");
44  }
45  catch(...){
46  Q_EMIT disableAuto();
47  }
48 
49  setImageprocessorRunning = n.serviceClient<image_processor::setProcessRunning>("/object_2D_detection/setProcessRunning");
50  setImageprocessorColor = n.serviceClient<image_processor::setVideoColor>("/object_2D_detection/setVideoColor");
51  setImageprocessorUndistort = n.serviceClient<image_processor::setVideoUndistortion>("/object_2D_detection/setVideoUndistortion");
52  setImageprocessorBruteforce = n.serviceClient<image_processor::setBruteforceMatching>("/object_2D_detection/setBruteforceMatching");
53  setImageprocessorKeypoint = n.serviceClient<image_processor::setKeypointDetectorType>("/object_2D_detection/setKeypointDetectorType");
54  setImageprocessorDescriptor = n.serviceClient<image_processor::setDescriptorType>("/object_2D_detection/setDescriptorType");
55  setImageprocessorMatchingImage = n.serviceClient<image_processor::setMatchingImage1>("/object_2D_detection/setMatchingImage1");
56  setImageprocessorDepth = n.serviceClient<image_processor::setImageDepth>("/object_2D_detection/setImageDepth");
57  goToClient_ag1 = n.serviceClient<agilus_planner::Pose>("/robot_service_ag1/go_to_pose");
58  goToClient_ag2 = n.serviceClient<agilus_planner::Pose>("/robot_service_ag2/go_to_pose");
59  planClient_ag1 = n.serviceClient<agilus_planner::Pose>("/robot_service_ag1/plan_pose");
60  planClient_ag2 = n.serviceClient<agilus_planner::Pose>("/robot_service_ag2/plan_pose");
61  setAgilus1Digout = n.serviceClient<kuka_rsi_hw_interface::write_8_outputs>("/ag1/kuka_hardware_interface/write_8_digital_outputs");
62 
63  object2Dpose = n.subscribe<geometry_msgs::Pose2D,QNode>("/object_2D_detected/object1", 1000, &QNode::object2DPoseCallback,this);
64 
65  plan_ag1(0.445,-0.6025,1.66,0.0,3.1415,0.0);
66  plan_ag1(0.445,-0.6025,1.66,0.0,3.1415,0.0);
67  plan_ag2(0.445,0.6025,1.66,0.0,3.1415,0.0);
68  plan_ag2(0.445,0.6025,1.66,0.0,3.1415,0.0);
69  counter = 0;
70  start();
71  return true;
72 }
73 
74 void QNode::run(){
75  ros::Rate loop_rate(60);
76  while ( ros::ok() ) {
77  ros::spinOnce();
78  loop_rate.sleep();
79  }
80  Q_EMIT rosShutdown(); // used to signal the gui for a shutdown
81 }
82 
83 void QNode::subscribeToPointCloud2(QString topic){
84  ros::NodeHandle n;
85  const char *tmp = topic.toUtf8().constData();
86  pointCloud2Sub = n.subscribe<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2, QNode>(tmp, 1, &QNode::cloudCallback,this);
87 
88 }
89 
90 void QNode::subscribeTo2DobjectDetected(QString topic){
91  ros::NodeHandle n;
92  const char *tmp = topic.toUtf8().constData();
93  object2DdetectedSub = n.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Image, QNode>(tmp, 1, &QNode::object2DCallback,this);
94 }

96 void QNode::setProcessImageRunning(bool processRunning){
97  setImproRunning.request.running = processRunning;
98  setImageprocessorRunning.call(setImproRunning);
99 }

133 void QNode::move_ag1(double x, double y, double z, double roll, double pitch, double yaw){
134  setPoseRequest(false,true,x,y,z,true,roll,pitch,yaw);
135  goToClient_ag1.call(pose_service);
136 }

139  setPoseRequest(false,true,x,y,z,true,roll,pitch,yaw);
140  goToClient_ag2.call(pose_service);
141 }

153 void QNode::closeAG1Gripper(){
154  agilusDigout.request.out1 = true;
155  agilusDigout.request.out2 = true;
156  agilusDigout.request.out3 = false;
157  agilusDigout.request.out4 = false;
158  agilusDigout.request.out5 = false;
159  agilusDigout.request.out6 = false;
160  agilusDigout.request.out7 = false;
161  agilusDigout.request.out8 = false;
162  setAgilus1Digout.call(agilusDigout);
163 }
164 
165 void QNode::openAG1Gripper(){
166  agilusDigout.request.out1 = false;
167  agilusDigout.request.out2 = true;
168  agilusDigout.request.out3 = false;
169  agilusDigout.request.out4 = true;
170  agilusDigout.request.out5 = false;
171  agilusDigout.request.out6 = false;
172  agilusDigout.request.out7 = false;
173  agilusDigout.request.out8 = false;
174  setAgilus1Digout.call(agilusDigout);
175 }

177 void QNode::cloudCallback(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2ConstPtr &cloud_msg){
178  // Convert ROS message (PointCloud2) to PCL point cloud (PointCloud(PointXYZ))
179  pcl::fromROSMsg(*cloud_msg, *cloud);
180  Q_EMIT updatePointCloud(cloud);
181 }
182 
183 void QNode::object2DCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr &image){
184  // Early return if we are still reading the image
185  if(imageReading){
186  return;
187  }
188  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
189  try
190  {
191  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(image, "8UC3");
192  }
193  catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e)
194  {
195  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());
196  return;
197  }
198  // Emitting update image, remember to set the flag
199  setImageReading(true);
200  Q_EMIT update2Dimage(mat2qimage(cv_ptr->image));
201 }
202 
203 void QNode::object2DPoseCallback(const geometry_msgs::Pose2DConstPtr &msg){
204  x_object = msg->x;
205  y_object = msg->y;
206  theta_object = msg->theta;
207  counter++;
208 }
209 
210 QImage QNode::mat2qimage(cv::Mat& mat) {
211  switch (mat.type()) {
212  // 8-bit, 4 channel
213  case CV_8UC4: {
214  QImage image(mat.data, mat.cols, mat.rows, mat.step, QImage::Format_RGB32);
215  return image;
216  }
217  // 8-bit, 3 channel
218  case CV_8UC3: {
219  const uchar *qImageBuffer = (const uchar*)mat.data;
220  QImage image(qImageBuffer, mat.cols, mat.rows, mat.step, QImage::Format_RGB888);
221  return image.rgbSwapped();
222  }
223  // 8-bit, 1 channel
224  case CV_8UC1: {
225  static QVector<QRgb> sColorTable;
226  // only create our color table once
227  if (sColorTable.isEmpty()) {
228  for (int i = 0; i < 256; ++i)
229  sColorTable.push_back(qRgb(i, i, i));
230  }
231  QImage image(mat.data, mat.cols, mat.rows, mat.step, QImage::Format_Indexed8);
232  image.setColorTable(sColorTable);
233  return image;
234  }
235  default:
236  std::cout << "ASM::cvMatToQImage() - cv::Mat image type not handled in switch:" << mat.type();
237  break;
238  }
239  return QImage();
240 }
241 
242 std::string QNode::type2str(int type){
243  std::string r;
244 
245  uchar depth = type & CV_MAT_DEPTH_MASK;
246  uchar chans = 1 + (type >> CV_CN_SHIFT);
247 
248  switch (depth) {
249  case CV_8U:
250  r = "8U";
251  break;
252  case CV_8S:
253  r = "8S";
254  break;
255  case CV_16U:
256  r = "16U";
257  break;
258  case CV_16S:
259  r = "16S";
260  break;
261  case CV_32S:
262  r = "32S";
263  break;
264  case CV_32F:
265  r = "32F";
266  break;
267  case CV_64F:
268  r = "64F";
269  break;
270  default:
271  r = "User";
272  break;
273  }
274  r += "C";
275  r += (chans + '0');
276 
277  // USAGE
278  // std::string ty = type2str( H.type() );
279  // printf("Matrix: %s %dx%d \n", ty.c_str(), H.cols, H.rows );
280 
281  return r;
282 }
283 
284 void QNode::setPoseRequest(bool relative, bool position, double x, double y, double z, bool orientation, double roll, double pitch, double yaw){
285  pose_service.request.header.frame_id = "/world";
286  pose_service.request.relative = relative;
287  pose_service.request.set_position = position;
288  pose_service.request.position_x = x;
289  pose_service.request.position_y = y;
290  pose_service.request.position_z = z;
291  pose_service.request.set_orientation = orientation;
292  pose_service.request.orientation_r = roll;
293  pose_service.request.orientation_p = pitch;
294  pose_service.request.orientation_y = yaw;
295 }
